name: HueTopia (itch)
description:
HueTopia is an original grid-based puzzle game where every color matters!

Press space to cycle through colors, or press 1-6 to go directly to a specific color. Move using the arrow keys or WASD. Press R to restart the level and N to skip a level. Only skip if absolutely needed!
Try to beat all 20 levels!

All art and code by me
Music and sound effects from freesound.org.
Enjoy!
